definition[0]: a secured loan, debt etc is protected by an agreement that if it is not paid, the borrower must give the lender certain assets, such as property or shares
example[0]: Secured credit cards are backed by a deposit that a consumer must make with the card issuer.
example[1]: The secured debentures will mature on Jan. 15,2006.
definition[1]: someone who lends money, with an agreement that if the debt is not paid, the borrower has to give the lender certain assets, such as property or shares
example[2]: The company’s secured lender foreclosed on the company’s assets last week.
